cause.description:
The idea is that we acquire a bunch of used bikes, refurbish them, paint them green, and leave them around campus for anyone to use.
Better for the environment, better for personal health, better for traffic.
1. Emissions must be reduced in order to reduce Global Warming.
2. Obesity is a problem, and biking is a partial solution.
3. Traffic is a major problem on CMU's campus. Increased biking and decreased driving will help.
cause.mission: Start a Green Bike Project on campus.
cause.name: Project Green Bike
